name: Fathers Day Mens Collection
description:
Our Mens Soap Line is completely Natural, scented with Essential Oils, made with ingredients that are specially formulated for Mens Skin.

This package comes complete with One Each our 4 signatures Mens Soaps including:
+++Black Tie: Activated Charcoal Detoxifies the skin while Shea butter Nourishes. This bar is great for anyone with problematic skin & people who Love Black Licorice (Anise Essential Oil)
+++Key Lime & Black Pepper: Fresh Key Lime with a Touch of Spice. This Soap is coloured with French Green Clay, clearing your pores from impurities
+++Muskoka Man: Smell like you've taken a walk in the Canadian Outback, Pine, Cedarwood & Patchouli = Sex Magnet Material! Made with all Natural Hemp Oil
+++Gentlemans Shaving Soap: One of our most popular soaps! This bar is specially designed with conditioning oils and Kaolin Clay to add slip to your razor for a close shave leaving you with soft moisturized skin.

All of my soap is Handcrafted using the traditional Cold Process method, giving you the most natural experience to your spa routine.

{Disclaimer}: We are not skin doctors or physicians and all of the listed natural benefits of our products are based solely upon personally researched historical, traditional and published data that cannot replace advice directly given by a certified physician. We do not claim that our products have any curative, medicinal, or therapeutic properties.
My soaps are made with vegetable/nut/soy oils. Do not use if you are allergic to any type of nut. For external use only.

+++Shipping: If you live in the TORONTO or DURHAM REGION area we can arrange a pick-up option to avoid shipping fees :) Overage over a $1 will be refunded, we do not make money on shipping.

Thank-you for visiting my shop!

name: Activated Charcoal Black Tie Soap
description:
Calling all you Mad Men Fans... This ones for you!

Take off the Work Tie and rub this Black Tie soap all over your body after a long day at the office. Organic Anise Essential Oil is a "mood" elevator to de-stress and un-wind, smells just like Black Licorice. Yumm

{Ingredients}: Coconut oil, Olive oil, Sustainable Forest Palm oil, Canola oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Shea Butter, Safflower oil, Castor oil, Avocado oil, Organic Anise Essential oil, Activated Charcoal & Love

All of my soap is Handcrafted in small batches using the traditional Cold Process method, giving you the most natural experience to your spa routine.

This listing is for One bar, weight around 4.5 ounces.

My soaps are made with vegetable/nut/soy oils. Do not use if you are allergic to any type of nut or soy - For external use only.

{Disclaimer}: We are not skin doctors or physicians and all of the listed natural benefits of our products are based solely upon personally researched historical, traditional and published data that cannot replace advice directly given by a certified physician. We do not claim that our products have any curative, medicinal, or therapeutic properties.

Overage over a $1 will be refunded. If you live in the TORONTO or DURHAM REGION area we can arrange a pick-up to avoid shipping fees

name: Natural Herbal Mens Shaving Soap
description:
Introducing my Unisex Herbal Shaving Soap.

This Handmade Eco-Friendly, Natural Soap is specially formulated to give you a close conditioning shave. This shaving soap is great used from head to toe! Whether it be a full-head shave or ZZ Top Legs!!

What makes this soap so special? Castor & Coconut oil give you a creamy lather. Fair Trade Shea butter, Olive oil, Hemp oil, & Avocado oil condition your skin = Anti - Alligator Legs!
Kaolin Clay is introduced to add “slip” to your razor. This handmade soap is scented with a combination of Basil, Sage & Mint Essential Oils leaving you revitalized and refreshed.

Ingredients: Coconut oil, Olive oil, Sustainable Forest Palm oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Fair Trade Shea Butter, Hemp oil, Avocado oil, Castor oil, Canola oil, Kaolin Clay, Sweet Basil, Sage & Peppermint Essential Oils, Cocoa powder & parsley (natural colourant)

All of my soap is created using the traditional Cold Process method, giving you the most natural experience to your spa routine.

This listing is for One bar of soap, weight around 4.5 ounces.

Disclaimer: The statements presented on this site have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. The products offered on this website are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

PLEASE NOTE: Handmade soap will last a long time if kept dry between uses. Please use a draining soap dish and keep away from direct flow of water.

Canada Post charges almost as much to ship 1 bar of soap as it does 4, buy in multiples & save$! Overage over a $1 will be refunded. If you live in the TORONTO or DURHAM REGION area we can arrange a pick-up to avoid shipping fees :)

Thank-you for visiting my shop!

name: All Natural Chap Balm
description:
Handmade All Natural Beeswax Lip Balm

This Natural Chap has a slight sweet Chocolate & Honey scent coming from the Cocoa Butter & Natural Beeswax. This is a great Lip Balms for all you "Chaps" out there who know how important it is to have soft lips.

Thanks to my simple formula, Aide Lip Balms are 100% NATURAL. Leaving your lips soft, smooth & conditioned, never greasy! Infused with the antioxidant goodness of Mango Butter & healing Vitamin E

All our lip balms are always Free of Mineral Oils, Parabens, Phthalates & Petroleum products.

Handcrafted in Canada, Aide Natural Lip Balm is made from a lovely blend of
raw Ingredients: Canadian Beeswax, Cocoa Butter, Mango Butter (known for its protective effect against UV radiation) Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Vitamin E & Love.

This listing is for one hand-mixed, individually poured lip balm, weighing 10grams each.

Makes great Party Favors: Bachelorette, Wedding, Shower, Birthday & more!
We can customize the flavor & packaging to suit your theme.
Message me for details.

Did you know... Aide Lip Balms are great for kids?! Kids lick there lips when wearing lip balm so why not give them something 100% natural to wear.

Do not use if you are allergic to Nuts (Contains Sweet Almond Oil)
Don't forget to keep away from heat.
Does Not contain SPF
